Html:
There seem to be quite a few review comments regarding if this project is still up and running and if there are any further planned concrete releases. ('We plan to release sometime in 2011' not being concrete).

Anyone out there know what's going on? If so, please share the love!

Thanks,

  John

The only way to get an answer is to ask Pete Brown, Rob Relyea, or Scott Gu ( or all three ) in an email, nicely of course.    And even then, they are not going to give up much real info.  The real answer will only be evident after they actually update the site or kill it.   At this point all of the promises of support real soon now mean nothing, it all comes down to them actually doing it.   I personally dont believe we will see an update until the plans for .net vNext are solid and they have a need to put something out for testing.  Like they did with the Calendar and Data Grid for .net 4.0.  And an update even then is iffy in my mind.  Thats my opinion.

( from one of several who have been complaining about it since last year, and have emailed many times )

pmont
